patterns: This contract has a cancellation fee of
There is also an early termination fee of
Early termination fee of $300 will apply if the contract is cancelled before the end date
Late payment penalty of $50 after 5 days past due
Grace period of 14 days is allowed for late payments before penalties apply
Liability limited to $5,000 for any damages
The contract guarantees transparent pricing with no hidden fees
Early termination fee applies if the contract is cancelled before 12 months
Automatic renewal for an additional 12 months unless cancelled in writing 60 days before expiry
Money-back guarantee applies if you are not satisfied within 30 days
Data will be kept secure and GDPR compliant
Binding arbitration is required for all disputes, potentially limiting legal remedies
